LandPreparation.Plowing: Deep plow the field to a depth of 20-25 cm to break hard pans.
LandPreparation.Harrowing: Perform two to three harrowings to create a fine tilth.
LandPreparation.Leveling: Level the field to ensure uniform seedbed and water distribution.

InterCultivationOperations.Weeding: Manual or chemical weeding during early growth stages.
InterCultivationOperations.Fertilization: Apply nitrogen, phosphorus, and potassium at recommended rates.
InterCultivationOperations.Irrigation: Provide timely irrigation at critical growth stages like tillering, booting, and grain filling.
